title: Child Support Reserve Trust Act
content: Requires a State reserve unit to: (1) withhold the net proceeds from the sale or refinancing of real property in the State against which a lien for overdue child support by the seller or refinancer has arisen. (2) hold a certain amount of such proceeds in trust for the benefit of the child or children for whom the person has a support obligation. And (3) apply such amounts to satisfy such overdue child support, if all other available remedies are insufficient to do so.
